title: Definitions
context: PART II. VOTING MACHINE SYSTEM Note Part heading amended by L 1975, c 36, ยง5(1). ยง16-11 Definitions. &ldquo;Protective counter&rdquo; means an apparatus built into the voting machine which cannot be reset, which records the total movement of the operating lever. &ldquo;Voting machine system&rdquo; means the method of electrically, mechanically, or electronically recording and counting votes upon being cast. [L 1970, c 26, pt of ยง2; am L 1975, c 36, ยง5(2)] Revision Note Definitions rearranged.
